title: Chauvin’s Offensive Defense, “reparations” 4.16.21
itunes:title: Chauvin’s Offensive Defense, “reparations” 4.16.21
description:
In episode 859, Jack and Miles are joined by Bald Talk's Brian Huskey to discuss the Chauvin defense, the house pushing through legislation for reparations, the Republicans reaction to the Johnson & Johnson vaccine, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. Derek Chauvin’s Legal Defense Is Flimsy Courtroom Whataboutism
  2. In Historic Move, House Panel Advances Reparations Legislation to Study Impact of Slavery and Racism
  3. U.S. recommends 'pause' for Johnson & Johnson vaccine in response to 6 clot reports
  4. Canada won’t cancel Johnson & Johnson vaccine contract despite safety concerns: Anand
  5. Australia opts to not purchase Johnson & Johnson vaccine, citing clot concerns
  6. The J&J Vaccine Is Not a Tainted Cantaloupe
  7. Johnson & Johnson vaccine pause fuels anti-vax rhetoric from right-wing media
  8. President Trump on Vaccines: From Skeptic to Cheerleader
  9. Trump Floats Pfizer Conspiracy Theory While Blasting Biden For J&J Pause
  10. Without his Twitter account, Trump's conspiracy theories find little traction
  11. LISTEN: I KNOW PARADISE - The Platters

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
